CustomField.description: Automatically create a Payee record where the Contact on the Shift does not have one. Note - If an Employee has a Payee record but 'Assignment Primary Payee' is unchecked, an additional Payee record may be created where their Payee Payment Entity does not match this contracts Payment Entity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically create a Payee record where the Contact on the Shift does not have one. Note - If an Employee has a Payee record but 'Assignment Primary Payee' is unchecked, an additional Payee record may be created where their Payee Payment Entity does not match this contracts Payment Entity.
CustomField.label: Auto Create Payee
